descriptions.400: Your request is as bad as your CS at 20 minutes. Maybe try again with proper syntax?
descriptions.401: You need to authenticate. Even Iron IV players know you gotta log in first.
descriptions.402: This content requires payment. Time to buy some RP or stick to free champs.
descriptions.403: Access denied. You've been chat restricted from this page. Maybe stop flaming?
descriptions.404: Page not found. We know about your 0/10 powerspike, but this isn't it. Try warding next time.
descriptions.405: Method not allowed. Wrong move, like taking Flash on Yuumi. Try a different approach.
descriptions.406: Format not acceptable. Even your team wouldn't accept this request. GG go next.
descriptions.408: Request timeout. Were you AFK farming jungle while the request waited? FF @ 15.
descriptions.409: Conflict detected. Two requests fighting over the same resource. Someone's wintrading.
descriptions.410: This page is gone forever. Deleted faster than your LP after promos. Lost in champ select.
descriptions.413: Request too large. You're sending more data than a 0/12 Yasuo feeds kills.
descriptions.429: Too many requests. Stop spam pinging the server. We get it, you need help. Toxic much?
descriptions.500: Server error. The backend is inting harder than your last ranked game. 0/16 powerspike incoming.
descriptions.502: Bad gateway. The connection between servers is as disconnected as your jungler from the team.
descriptions.503: Service unavailable. Servers are taking a break. Even they can't handle this toxicity.
descriptions.504: Gateway timeout. The connection is lagging worse than your 200ms ping. Jungle diff.
descriptions.default: An error occurred. Your team diff.

footers.404: gg ez, jg diff, report team
